clinical_study.brief_title: The Corneal and Conjunctiva Sensation Before and After Pterygium Surgeries
clinical_study.official_title: The Corneal and Conjunctiva Sensation Before and After Pterygium Surgeries

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this current study is to examine the sensation of the corneal and conjunctiva sensation before and after pterygium surgeries by Cochet bonnet esthesiometer and to examine epidemiological, clinical and imaging factors the influence the sensation

primary_outcome.measure: To sensation before and after pterygium surgeries as measured by Cochet bonnet esthesiometer
primary_outcome.time_frame: Before surgery compare to one week+ one month+three months after surgery
primary_outcome.description: The change in sensation in the cornea and conjunctiva after pterygium surgery as measured by Cochet bonnet esthesiometer

secondary_outcome.measure: To examine the change in dry eye syndrome that may predicate the change in sensation after pterygium surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before surgery compare to one week+ one month+three months after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Dry eye will be measured by Tear break up time

secondary_outcome.measure: To examine the change in dry eye syndrome that may predicate the change in sensation after pterygium surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before surgery compare to one week+ one month+three months after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Dry eye will be measured by Schrimer test

secondary_outcome.measure: To examine the change in dry eye syndrome that may predicate the change in sensation after pterygium surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before surgery compare to one week+ one month+three months after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Dry eye will be measured by lissamine green test

secondary_outcome.measure: To examine the change in visual acuity that may predicate the change in sensation after pterygium surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before surgery compare to one week+ one month+three months after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Visual acuity will be measured by Snellen chart

secondary_outcome.measure: To examine the change in refraction that may predicate the change in sensation after pterygium surgery:
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before surgery compare to one week+ one month+three months after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Refraction will be measured by autorefractometer

secondary_outcome.measure: To examine the change in anterior chamber that may predicate the change in sensation after pterygium surgery:
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before surgery compare to one week+ one month+three months after surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: To examine the change in imaging of anterior segment that may predicate the change in sensation after pterygium surgery:
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before surgery compare to one week+ one month+three months after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Anterior Chamber Optical coherence tomography( AC-OCT)

secondary_outcome.measure: To examine the Recurrence of pterygium
secondary_outcome.time_frame: one week+ one month+three months after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Recurrence of pterygium as examined in slit lamp examination

intervention.description: Cochet bonnet esthesiometer- To examine sensation

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients that suppose to undergo pterigyum surgery
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with anterior segment diseases Patients that underwent anterior segment surgeries Patients with 7th nerve palsy
